title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, when I click on Styles -> SWT.SINGLE and then click on Styles -> SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound. I believe this behavior is not intended.
OB: The ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the SWT example ControlExample. 2. Go to the Text tab. 3. Click on Styles -> SWT.SINGLE. 4. Click on Styles -> SWT.MULTI. Note that the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound.
